head.title: World Briefing | Middle East: Syria: Prominent Dissident Arrested

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Middle East: Syria: Prominent Dissident Arrested

block.p: The authorities arrested Michel Kilo, a prominent opposition figure and writer, over the weekend. It was latest in a number of arrests of government critics. Mr. Kilo's arrest came just days after he signed a petition calling for a radical overhaul of Syria's relations with neighboring Lebanon, a rights group said.
